title: [Greymist Wood, The Shroud]
description: The forest is almost as silent as it is dark.  A fog bank rolls in from the distant shore, mingling with the misty carpet of the wood.  Even the chorus of frogs in the undergrowth seems distant and dreamlike.
The forest is almost as silent as it is dark.  A fog bank rolls in from the distant shore, mingling with the misty carpet of the wood.  Even the calls of birds in the canopy above seem dreamlike.
paths: Obvious paths: north, northeast, east, south
